thread.title: BRIEF-Arconic Says Portfolio Review May Include Potentially Selling Certain Assets - Conf Call‍​

title: BRIEF-Arconic Says Portfolio Review May Include Potentially Selling Certain Assets - Conf Call‍​
text:
04 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Arconic Says Portfolio Review May Include Potentially Selling Certain Assets - Conf Call‍​ Reuters Staff 1   Arconic Inc: 
* ARCONIC CEO SAYS, WITH RESPECT TO PORTFOLIO REVIEW, CO WILL LOOK AT EVERYTHING THAT MAY INCLUDE POTENTIALLY EXITING CERTAIN BUSINESSES OR SELLING CERTAIN ASSETS - CONF CALL‍​ 
* ARCONIC CEO SAYS ENGINE RAMP IS AMONG THE BIGGEST CHALLENGES INDUSTRIALLY THAT THE AVIATION COMMUNITY HAS FACED - CONF CALL‍​ Further company coverage:
